sorgu.Sorgu_metin: SELECT CHARVAL.* FROM {CHARSETASGN} CHARSETASGN INNER JOIN {CHARCODE} CHARCODE ON CHARVAL.CHARCODEREF = CHARCODE.LOGICALREF CHARSETASGN.LINENR WHERE CHARCODE.LOGICALREF = @_CHARCODE_REF

--VAR ISE OLUSTURMAMALI, KONTROL EKLENMELİ CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART]( [LOGICALREF] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [FIRM_NO] [int] NOT NULL, [MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF] [int] NOT NULL, [MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF] [int] NOT NULL, [NOTE] [nvarchar](255) NOT NULL, [REC_ADD_DATE] [datetime] NOT NULL, [REC_ADD_USERS_REF] [int] NOT NULL, [REC_UPD_DATE] [datetime] NOT NULL, [REC_UPD_USERS_REF] [int] NOT NULL, [ACTIVE] [int] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [LOGICALREF] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO CREATE UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART] ON [dbo].[TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART] ( [FIRM_NO] ASC, [MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF] ASC, [MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF] ASC, [ACTIVE] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART_LINE]( [LOGICALREF] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [ITEM_CODE_PART_REF] [int] NOT NULL, [CHARCODE_REF] [int] NOT NULL, [REQUIRED] [int] NOT NULL, [LINE_NO] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK__TRP_TIN___11B8C5C12BD34AC9] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [LOGICALREF] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 100) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO

sorgu.Aciklama: Sor sorma bolumunde ilk kirilimin doldurulacagi kismi getirir
sorgu.Sorgu_metin: SELECT CHARSET.LOGICALREF, CHARSET.CODE, CHARSET.NAME, CHARCODE.LOGICALREF AS CHARCODE_REF, CHARCODE.CODE AS CHARCODE_CODE, CHARCODE.NAME AS CHARCODE_NAME, CHARVAL.LOGICALREF AS CHARVAL_REF, CHARVAL.VALNO AS CHARVAL_VALNO, CHARVAL.CODE AS CHARVAL_CODE, CHARVAL.NAME AS CHARVAL_NAME, CHARVAL.NAME2 AS CHARVAL_NAME2, CHARSETASGN.LINENR AS CHARSETASGN_LINENR FROM {CHARSET} CHARSET INNER JOIN {CHARSETASGN} CHARSETASGN ON CHARSETASGN.CHARSETREF = CHARSET.[LOGICALREF] INNER JOIN {CHARCODE} CHARCODE ON CHARSETASGN.CHARCODEREF = CHARCODE.[LOGICALREF] INNER JOIN {CHARVAL} CHARVAL ON CHARVAL.CHARCODEREF = CHARCODE.LOGICALREF WHERE CHARCODE.CODE = @_CHARCODE_CODE --'HM_TEMPER' ORDER BY CHARSETASGN.[LINENR], CHARVAL.VALNO

sorgu.Aciklama: Sor sorma bolumunde ikinci kirilimin doldurulacagi kismi getirir
sorgu.Sorgu_metin: --ASLINDA BURADA SELECT 'HM_TEMPER' GIBI BIR SORGU LAZIM SELECT CHARSET.LOGICALREF, CHARSET.CODE, CHARSET.NAME, CHARCODE.LOGICALREF AS CHARCODE_REF, CHARCODE.CODE AS CHARCODE_CODE, CHARCODE.NAME AS CHARCODE_NAME, CHARSETASGN.LINENR AS CHARSETASGN_LINENR FROM {CHARSET} CHARSET INNER JOIN {CHARSETASGN} CHARSETASGN ON CHARSETASGN.CHARSETREF = CHARSET.[LOGICALREF] INNER JOIN {CHARCODE} CHARCODE ON CHARSETASGN.CHARCODEREF = CHARCODE.[LOGICALREF] WHERE CHARCODE.CODE = 'HM_KALINLIK' ORDER BY CHARSETASGN.[LINENR]

SELECT PART.LOGICALREF, PART.NOTE AS [NOTE;Caption:Açıklama], PART.REC_ADD_DATE AS [REC_ADD_DATE;Caption:Kayıt Ekleme Tarihi], PART.REC_UPD_DATE AS [REC_UPD_DATE;Caption:Kayıt Güncelleme Tarihi], CASE PART.ACTIVE WHEN 0 THEN 'Kullanımda' ELSE 'Kullanım Dışı' END AS [ACTIVE;Caption:Kullanım Durumu], CHARVAL1.CODE AS [CHARVAL1_CODE;Caption:Malzeme Cinsi], CHARVAL1.NAME AS [CHARVAL1_NAME;Caption:Malzeme Cinsi Adı], CHARVAL2.CODE AS [CHARVAL2_CODE;Caption:Kalıp Kodu], CHARVAL2.NAME AS [CHARVAL2_NAME;Caption:Kalıp Adı] FROM TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART PART INNER JOIN {CHARVAL} CHARVAL1 ON PART.MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF = CHARVAL1.LOGICALREF INNER JOIN {CHARVAL} CHARVAL2 ON PART.MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF = CHARVAL2.LOGICALREF WHERE FIRM_NO = {Firm} AND ACTIVE = @_ACTIVE ORDER BY PART.LOGICALREF
SELECT CHARVAL.* FROM {CHARVAL} CHARVAL INNER JOIN {CHARCODE} CHARCODE ON CHARVAL.CHARCODEREF = CHARCODE.LOGICALREF WHERE CHARCODE.LOGICALREF = @_CHARCODE_REF

SELECT PART_LINE.*, CHARCODE.CODE AS CHARCODE_CODE, CHARCODE.NAME AS CHARCODE_NAME FROM TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART_LINE PART_LINE INNER JOIN {CHARCODE} CHARCODE ON PART_LINE.CHARCODE_REF = CHARCODE.LOGICALREF WHERE ITEM_CODE_PART_REF = @_ITEM_CODE_PART_REF ORDER BY LINE_NO

sorgu.Aciklama: MALZEME kod tanim baslik kismini gunceller
sorgu.Sorgu_metin: UPDATE TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART SET FIRM_NO = @_FIRM_NO, MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF = @_MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF, MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF = @_MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF, NOTE = @_NOTE, REC_UPD_DATE = @_REC_UPD_DATE, REC_UPD_USERS_REF = @_REC_UPD_USERS_REF WHERE LOGICALREF = @_REF

sorgu.Aciklama: MALZEME kod tanim baslik kismini kaydeder
MALZEME kod tanim satir kismini gunceller
sorgu.Sorgu_metin: UPDATE TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART_LINE SET ITEM_CODE_PART_REF = @_ITEM_CODE_PART_REF, CHARCODE_REF = @_CHARCODE_REF, REQUIRED = @_REQUIRED, LINE_NO = @_LINE_NO WHERE LOGICALREF = @_REF

sorgu.Aciklama: MALZEME kod tanim satir kismini kaydeder
sorgu.Sorgu_metin:
INSERT INTO TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART_LINE ([ITEM_CODE_PART_REF], CHARCODE_REF, [REQUIRED], [LINE_NO]) VALUES (@_ITEM_CODE_PART_REF, @_CHARCODE_REF, @_REQUIRED, @_LINE_NO)
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
SELECT COUNT(LOGICALREF) FROM TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART WHERE MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF = @_MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF AND MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF = @_MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF AND LOGICALREF <> @_REF

sorgu.Aciklama: Malzeme kod tanim listesinde AKTIF alanini gunceller
sorgu.Sorgu_metin: UPDATE TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART SET ACTIVE = CASE ACTIVE WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE LOGICALREF = @_REF

SELECT PART_LINE.*, CHARCODE.CODE AS CHARCODE_CODE, CHARCODE.NAME AS CHARCODE_NAME FROM TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART_LINE PART_LINE INNER JOIN TRP_TIN_ITEM_CODE_PART PART ON PART_LINE.ITEM_CODE_PART_REF = PART.LOGICALREF INNER JOIN {CHARCODE} CHARCODE ON PART_LINE.CHARCODE_REF = CHARCODE.LOGICALREF WHERE --ITEM_CODE_PART_REF = @_ITEM_CODE_PART_REF PART.MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF = @_PART_MAIN1_CHARVAL_REF AND PART.MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF = @_PART_MAIN2_CHARVAL_REF AND PART_LINE.REQUIRED = 1 AND PART.ACTIVE = 0 ORDER BY LINE_NO

mesaj.Metin: Bu kısım ile ilgili çalışmalar devam ediyor!
Bu Malzeme Cinsi ve Kalıp Kodu zaten kayıtlı!
Bu Malzeme Cinsi ve Kalıp Kodu için tanım yapılmamış!

alt_sorgu.Icerik: ( SELECT CHARASGN2.CHARVALREF FROM {CHARASGN} CHARASGN2 WHERE CHARASGN2.ITEMREF = ITEMS.LOGICALREF AND CHARASGN2.LINENR = 'TE' OR CHARASGN2.LINENR = 'TE' ) = @_PART_{P_1}
